  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99967</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99967</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner flame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bunsenbrennerflamme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flamme de brûleur de Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flama do queimador de Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiamma del bruciatore di Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φλόγα καυστήρων Bunsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Llama de la hornilla de Bunsen</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the flames produced by a Bunsen burner with the air hole open (left) and closed (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air hole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flames</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Flammen, die durch 
einen Bunsenbrenner mit dem Luftloch produziert werden, das geöffnet 
ist (link) und (recht) geschlossen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les flammes produites 
par un brûleur de Bunsen avec le trou d'air ouvert (gauche) et 
fermées (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as flamas produzidas por
um queimador de Bunsen com o furo de ar aberto (esquerdo) e fechadas 
(direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le fiamme prodotte da
un bruciatore di Bunsen con il foro di aria aperto (di sinistra) e 
chiuso (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις φλόγες που παράγονται
από έναν καυστήρα Bunsen με την τρύπα αέρα ανοικτή 
(αριστερός) και κλειστές (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las llamas producidas 
por una hornilla de Bunsen con el agujero de aire abierto (izquierdo) 
y cerradas (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftloch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bunsenbrenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flammen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trou d'air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brûleur de Bunsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flammes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">furo de ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queimador de Bunsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">flamas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">foro di aria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bruciatore di Bunsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fiamme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρύπα αέρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φλόγες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agujero de aire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hornilla de Bunsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">llamas</string>
          </keyword>
